rules_text:
Aurora [i](At your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, it gains lifelink. If there are three or more colors in your aurora, it gains deathtouch. If there are five or more, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
